articles.content: Korean director Park Chan-wook was once the master of gonzo revenge violence but with the adaptation of the Sarah Waters novel The Handmaiden in 2016 he pivoted with flair to the elegantly designed s… [+3388 chars]

articles.author: Rebecca Cook
articles.title: Gogglebox stars leave Channel 4 viewers devastated with sudden filming update - The Mirror
articles.description: Gogglebox armchair critics Julie Malone and her husband Tom Malone Sr have now shared a filming update on the Channel 4 show after scooping a TV BAFTA earlier this month
articles.content:
Gogglebox stars have left fans of the hit Channel 4 show devastated after they shared an update on filming for the show.
The famed armchair critics returned to screens for another season earlier thi… [+2490 chars]
